Parameter.Name: Direction
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Notes: Direction for a Numeric sensor value to change.
Used in Sensor Change Modes that have an Amount input.
0 = Increase
1 = Decrease
2 = Any

Parameter.Name: Port
Parameter.Description: Many programming blocks require that you select the ports on the EV3 Brick (A, B, C, D, 1, 2, 3, and 4) that these blocks will use. The Port Selectors are in the top right-hand corner of these blocks.

Parameter.Name: Comparison
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Allowed Values: 0 - 5
Notes: 0: = (Equal to)
1: ≠ (Not Equal to)
2: > (Greater than)
3: ≥ (Greater than or Equal to)
4: < (Less than)
5: ≤ (Less than or Equal to)

Parameter.Name: Threshold
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Allowed Values: Any number
Notes: Value to compare sensor data to

Parameter.Name: Amount
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Notes: Amount for sensor value to change in a Sensor Change Mode

Parameter.Name: Color
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Notes: Detected color number:
1 = Black
2 = Blue
3 = Green
4 = Yellow
5 = Red
6 = White

Parameter.Name: Value
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Notes: The sensor data value used for a Compare mode.

Parameter.Name: RawValue
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Notes: The sensor data raw value used for a Compare mode.

]

Parameter.Name: Result
Parameter.Description:
Type: Logic
Notes: True/False result of a Compare mode.

Parameter.Name: Set of colors
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric Array
Allowed Values: Each element: 1 – 6
Notes: Selected color(s) to test for in Compare – Color mode:
1 = Black
2 = Blue
3 = Green
4 = Yellow
5 = Red
6 = White

Block.Description: The Measure – NXT Color - Color mode outputs the detected color number in Color.
The Measure – NXT Color - Reflected Light Intensity (Red) mode outputs the light intensity in Measured Value.
The Measure - NXT Color – Reflected Light Intensity (Green) mode outputs the light intensity in Measured Value.
The Measure – NXT Color - Reflected Light Intensity mode (Blue) outputs the light intensity in Measured Value.
The Measure – NXT Color - Ambient Light Intensity mode outputs the light intensity in Measured Value.
The Measure – NXT Color (Raw) - Reflected Light Intensity (Red) mode outputs the light intensity in Measured Value.
The Measure – NXT Color (Raw) - Reflected Light Intensity (Green) mode outputs the light intensity in Measured Value.
The Measure – NXT Color (Raw) - Reflected Light Intensity (Blue) mode outputs the light intensity in Measured Value.
The Measure – NXT Color (Raw) - Ambient Light Intensity mode outputs the light intensity in Measured Value.

In the Compare – NXT Color - Color mode, you can select one or more colors in the Set of Colors. The Compare Result output will be True if the detected color matches any of the selected colors. The detected color is output to Measured Value.

The Compare – NXT Color - Reflected Light Intensity (Red) mode compare the detected light intensity to the Threshold Value using the selected Compare Type. The True/False result is output in Compare Result, and the detected light intensity is output in Measured Value.

The Compare – NXT Color - Reflected Light Intensity (Green) mode compare the detected light intensity to the Threshold Value using the selected Compare Type. The True/False result is output in Compare Result, and the detected light intensity is output in Measured Value.

The Compare – NXT Color - Reflected Light Intensity (Blue) mode compare the detected light intensity to the Threshold Value using the selected Compare Type. The True/False result is output in Compare Result, and the detected light intensity is output in Measured Value.

The Compare – NXT Color - Ambient Light Intensity mode compare the detected light intensity to the Threshold Value using the selected Compare Type. The True/False result is output in Compare Result, and the detected light intensity is output in Measured Value.

The Compare – NXT Color (Raw) - Reflected Light Intensity (Red) mode compare the detected light intensity to the Threshold Value using the selected Compare Type. The True/False result is output in Compare Result, and the detected light intensity is output in Measured Value.

The Compare – NXT Color (Raw) - Reflected Light Intensity (Green) mode compare the detected light intensity to the Threshold Value using the selected Compare Type. The True/False result is output in Compare Result, and the detected light intensity is output in Measured Value.

The Compare – NXT Color (Raw) - Reflected Light Intensity (Blue) mode compare the detected light intensity to the Threshold Value using the selected Compare Type. The True/False result is output in Compare Result, and the detected light intensity is output in Measured Value.

The Compare – NXT Color (Raw) - Ambient Light Intensity mode compare the detected light intensity to the Threshold Value using the selected Compare Type. The True/False result is output in Compare Result, and the detected light intensity is output in Measured Value.
